name: Envoy's Pipe
loreDescription: Look carefully at the smoke that rises from the pipe--you'll see within whether you're destined for paradise or hell.

skillDescription.base: Decreases damage received by 10.0% when Health is less than 50%. When this effect is granted more than once, only the strongest effect is applied.
skillDescription.max: Decreases damage received by 20.0% when Health is less than 50%. When this effect is granted more than once, only the strongest effect is applied.
